transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan sir.
Customer: Awaaz nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Abhi awaaz aa rahi hai sir?
Customer: Haan, ab aa raha hai. Hello?
Executive: Aa raha hai, aa raha hai. To main, main, main yahi keh raha tha sir, ki ek baar na isko laptop mein login karke, achha sa internet connection ho aapke paas to, to wahan pe laptop mein login karke aur ek kaam kijiyega wahan pe extension laga lijiyega auto refresh karke.
Customer: Theek hai. Agar koi bhi value aati hai. Kya lagane ka? Extension? Extension, extension, extension laga lena auto refresh.
Customer: Auto refresh?
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Aur fir? To jaise wo aap.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: To fir mere ko kya aur main din bhar usko ghurta to nahi rahunga na screen ko?
Executive: Ab sir baat ye hai ke agar kisi bhai segment mein agar business nahi hota to wo aapke jo competitor hai na wo bhi nahi ghurte rehte hain wo ghur rahe hain refresh kar rahe hain baar baar tabhi ye expire hoti hai leads. Nahi to aisa nahi hai ki sirf photo wali ho, baki leads ke sath bhi aisa hi hona chahiye sir aapke to aapke agar yahan pe koi yahan se koi dikkat hoti to.
Customer: Nahi dikkat to hai, aapko samajhna padega dikkat to hai. Iske iske liye nahi to humko aisa karna padega next time usko MDC kara lenge. Wahi usko purana catalog de denge. Usko ye nahi to fir usko service mere ko ye services se koi fayda nahi hua. Is saal mein humne IndiaMART se jo hum lagbhag kuch business karte hain wo kuch bhi nahi hai. Is baar to uska jo price humne invest kiya wo bhi nahi nikla hai abhi tak.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: 70,000 jo humne dale wo nikle bhi nahi hai abhi tak.
Executive: Ji. Aisa hua hai.
Customer: Matlab samajh rahe ho aap ab chhe mahine beet chuke uske baad wo baat ke liye. Hmm. Ab January mein uska renewal aayega.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: To matlab wo usme ye karna padega humko ki wo shayad hum dekhenge baat karenge usme MDC convert karenge shayad kyunki usse usse fark pade kuch na kuch ya fir naya portfolio banayenge dusre iska MDC mein.
Executive: Sir aap fikar mat kijiye agar yahan se agar koi technical glitch hai to aapko bhi pata hai ki maine ek ticket to aapki taraf se already open ki hui hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Theek hai. Wahan se bhi chal raha hai matlab testing tester team pe ki hui hai CHQ tester team pe. To wahan se bhi chal raha hai sir sara kuch. Wo log bhi dekh hi rahe hain cheezon ko notice kar rahe hain aapka kaisa behavior hai.
Customer: Theek hai. Abhi to maine live proof de diya na aapko ki ye aap. Nahi live proof aapne de diya. Main batau sir live proof aapne de diya. Agar main batau hamari taraf se aisa kuch hota na to sare products ke sath hota. Aisa nahi kisi particular product ke sath hi aisa hota. Theek hai kyunki wahan se bhi mere ko sare proofs hi aaye the ke sir aisa kuch nahi hai and iska ye jo segment hai na jo photo wala hai.
Customer: Aapne aapne aapne jo cheez boli na mere ko ab wo dhyan mein aa rahi hai mere. Ki kya hai kisi ne to bhi koi extension le liya hai. Usko jaisa hi wo naya lead aata hai na wo automatically wo jo extension hai wo kharid leta hai wo lead ko. Wo aur usko ek baar ho gaya. Aisa kuch nahi extension main batau suno to sahi sir Yogesh ji extension lead kharid nahi sakta hai. Extension khali jis pair mein aapka ye khula hota hai na usko sirf refresh kar sakta hai extension. Aadmi ko wahan pe click bhi karna padega. Ab mere ko samajh mein aa gaya ki dekho apna jo interface hai na apan laptop pe khol rahe hain uske chrome ko extension de diya ki ye continue refresh hote rahega. Theek hai usko sirf command deni hai ki agar aisa koi cheez aata hai auto se related aisa koi lead aata hai to usko ye jagah pe click karne ka hai. Usko find karna hai ki haan ye buylead pe click karne ka hai to apne aap click bhi kar lega. Aisa koi bada bahut bada rocket science nahi hai wo program tayar karne mein. Chhoti moti coding karke usme dalne mein ki aisa kuch aaye to wo buy apne aap ho jaye. Dekhta hu main aisa software bhi hoga hi hoga 100% hoga.
Executive: Achha. Ho sakta hai na aapne jaisa bola. Sir main batau baat nahi nahi maine jo cheeze actual answer uske wahi aapko batayi. Dekhiye ye sari cheeze aisa hai ki technology to hai hi hai hum abhi jisse kaam kar rahe hain wo bhi technology hai sir. Aur is technology mein bhi agar hum utilize karein kisi dusri technology ka kisi effective way mein use karne ke liye to sir sari cheeze possible ho jati hain. Theek hai to maine wahi cheez aapko batayi ki sir ek baar na aap laptop mein login kijiye isko wahan pe. Nahi baat barabar hai main sirf aap mera point kya prove kara raha hu ki aapne kabhi tatkal ka ticket kiya hai train ka ek din pehle?
Customer: Tatkal ka nahi sir.
Customer: Milta hai kabhi kisi ko milta hai ek din pehle?
Customer: Nahi sir.
Customer: Nahi milta kyunki wahan pe itna bheed rehta hai kahin se kahin tak aap bhi karao nahi milega ticket. Kyunki sab log advance technology use karke usko block karke rakhte hain.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: To mujhe aise lagta hai aapke end se is is cheez ko meri taraf se aap point out kijiye ki koi baki jo buyers hai wo aisa koi program use kar rahe hain kya ki jisse unko wo matlab ek hi buyer har ek lead ye kar raha hai kya matlab wo organically buylead consume ho rahi hai ya inorganically ho rahi hai robot ki tarah. Matlab ek robot ki tarah ek robot lead aate hi khud ko consume kar leta hai aur aisa to hoga nahi koi bhi human hoga to mere jaisa ki mere se do teen lead chhut jati hai. Theek hai agar aisa koi banda hai ki jisko har baar ye lead mili milti ja rahi hai milti ja rahi hai milti ja rahi hai matlab wo kuch to bhi program use kar raha hai kuch to bhi robotics use kar raha hai wo us case mein. To isme aapne aapke technical team ko dalna chahiye ye sabke behalf pe ki aisa bhi ho sakta hai. Dekhiye apan jab captcha fill karte hain na koi bhi iska ki wo apne ko random digits dalna padta hai wo iske liye rehta hai ki koi program usko khud na execute kar le.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: So aapke jab buylead mein hota hai to uska koi captcha nahi dalna rehta hai usko sirf click karne ke baad mein aapko buyer ki detail mil jati hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Matlab automatically agar wahan click ho raha hai to wo wo usko mil raha hai ek hi bande ko jo jo hamesha use kar raha hai ye software aur isiliye wo panch user mein se wo ho sakta hai ki wahi same users wo panch hi same users hai jinko wo lead milte ja rahi hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Kyunki maine dekha hai Sunday ko nahi hota hai Sunday ko jo lead aati hai na wo sham tak bhi rehti hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Saturday ko bhi Saturday ki raat ko agar 10 8 10 baje lead aayi na to wo next hai waisi 11 12 baje tak wo expire nahi hoti hai. Working day mein tumhara subah 9:30 se sham ko 5 6 baje tak jaise hi jaise hi lead aata hai wo apne aap consume ho jaye wo to sabse busiest isme hai. Ye maine khud observe kiya hai.
Executive: Koi nahi sir ab jaise cheeze maine aapko cheeze batayi hai ek baar aap unko execute execute kijiye. Haan aur ye jo maine aapko concern bola aap aap raise kijiye tester team ko.
Executive: Hmm. Nahi to main mere end se mail furnish karta hu aapko bhejta hu aap forward kijiye usko. Chalega?
Executive: Theek hai sir. Nahi already DID call hai recorded hai sir.
Customer: Haan sahi hai na to koi problem nahi hai usme. Main aapko bol raha hu main mail karta hu aapko aap mail kijiye aage.
Executive: Wo to maine kar hi diya na sir usi din.
Customer: Nahi to jo mera concern hai uska main bol raha hu aapko.
Customer: Haan iska aapne mere ko photo bhej diya hai main photo bhej deta hu aage. Ye wala nahi main abhi jo bola hu aapko ki ho sakta hai ki log is pe aisa use kar rahe ho ki wahi same buyer ko same same category ki lead hamesha hi milti hai. Ye mera concern hai. Matlab baki duniya bhare se aapko ek star customer 5 lakh dega lekin wahi agar 10 10 MDC ya fir 50 jo kya ye verified wala wo TrustSeal ye aapko 7 ya 7 se 8 lakh ka dete hain. So aapko agar wo 5 lakh ka customer pyara hai to ye baki ke 10 15 lakh ke customer kuch matlab nahi hai mayne nahi hai inko to band kar dena chahiye services ko.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Wo aap hi socho ki ye ye cheez ho sakti hai isme aapke isme. Nahi hone wali cheez.
Executive: Ek kaam karta hu sir main aapke.
Customer: Main aapko mail karta hu main aapki na ek aap suno mail mat likhiye aap whatsapp pe na apna wo karke likh bhej dijiye mere ko baki main na ek call aapki apne senior se arrange kara deta hu. Haan haan haan theek hai theek hai chalega. Theek hai ye theek rahega sir theek hai. Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Leads are expiring too quickly.

- Believes competitors using bots to acquire leads.

- Expresses dissatisfaction with IndiaMART services.

- Invested amount not recovered.

- Thinks same buyers are getting all leads.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested using auto-refresh extension.

- Executive confirmed ticket already opened.

- Executive assured issue is being investigated.

- Executive offered to arrange a call with senior.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send concern via WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, technical glitch, auto refresh, mdc, trustseal
